column1: Intelligent Transport Planning and Engineering MSc
column3: School of Architecture, Computing and Engineering
column5: The programme is designed to meet the increasing demand for transport professionals with advanced skills in sustainable, integrated and intelligent transportation systems. The programme will provide you with the fundamental and advanced engineering knowledge that a modern transportation engineer needs for planning and managing the complex multi-modal transport system.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
